title: A reply of Sir George Downing Knight and Baronet, envoy extraordinary from His Majesty of Great-Britain, &c. to the remarks of the deputies of the Estates-General upon his memorial of December 20, 1664, old stile
author: Downing, George, Sir, 1623?-1684.
notes: On overseas commercial rivalries between British and Dutch trading companies and the seizures of ships, including references to the West Indies.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
